Flub.Name: Scale
Flub.Description: Scale of the transformation. Smaller scale creates more detail.

Flub.Name: Rift
Flub.Description: Creates one or more rifts in the main rock body.

Flub.Name: Folding
Flub.Description: How strongly the terrain should fold upon itself. Use sparingly!

Flub.Name: Seed
Flub.Description: The randomization pattern or seed for the node's process.
